title: Virginia Tech remembers those lost on 15th anniversary of shooting - WSET
content: Virginia Tech remembers those lost on 15th anniversary of shooting  WSET
description: Saturday marks 15 years since a gunman opened fire on the Virginia Tech campus killing 32 people. Virginia Tech is holding a Day of Remembrance for the lives lost on April 16, 2007, that began with a ceremonial candle lighting by representatives of the student body at midnight. The candle will remain lit for 24 hours.
